website_summaries.verdict: The PlayStation Gold Wireless Headset is an affordable, cable-free way to get game audio and voice chat through your PS4 or PC.
pros: Good sound quality with simulated 7.1-channel virtual surround
cons: Light padding and cramped earpads limit comfort

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily Very Fragile
customer_reviews.text: I always like to wait to write a review for these reasons. At first they seemed wonderful, lightweight, not so durable though so they were handled with care. That being said they were great until the hindges in them broke.The battery life quickly diminished. The sound was good quality and they are comfortable. Unfortunately the structure and durability of these are poor quality. I only bought these 5 months ago and obviously they were not cheap so I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Ok for gaming, but not for chat
customer_reviews.text: Tried this headset for a few weeks, and everyone had a hard time hearing me. They repeatedly said I sounded muffled (even after raising the mic volume very high). The sound on my end was good, but what's the point of having a mic if no one can hear you? I even tried a $25 set of wired headphones in voice chat on PS4, and everyone said that it was much clearer.
customer_reviews.author: Sum1

customer_reviews.title: Sony did it right with these!
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Turtle Beach gaming headsets which are good but always fall apart and break. I was a little skeptical about purchasing outside my normal and couldn't be happier with these headsets. The microphone works great in my online parties playing games with friends, they hear me loud and clear. You simply turn on the headset and sound is transferred to the headphones and when you turn them off the sound goes back to your normal speakers your using hooked up to your tv or console which in my case a sound bar. Games sound really good in these. I'm impressed and I highly recommend them to all PS4 gamers online or offline.
customer_reviews.author: Prestige PRIME Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Buy Tritons
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is not great. Friends all complained that my outgoing chat sound is awful. Spikes in volume occur regularly for my friends in chat parties. The headset is uncomfortable at best. A $50 triton headset was better in all ways besides comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Perrine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jones

customer_reviews.title: It's Sony
customer_reviews.text: Since you unable to use other Bluetooth headsets with pS4, these works really well
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have fantastic sound quality and get as loud as your ears can possibly take. They are extremely durable and pretty comfortable as well. The only thing that is somewhat lacking is the microphone but it is a very small issue. The microphone is plenty clear for people to understand in game and it is easy to adjust microphone volume in the PS4 settings to compensate. The headphone app is a very cool feature and works like a charm for bass boosting. Again the sound quality is better than any headphones I’ve purchased and they are well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Malone

customer_reviews.title: New Feature?
customer_reviews.text: My son really loves these. This is his 3rd pair over the years (all this brand and model). He says that this one has a new feature so that you can use them wired into a device such as a phone or the PS4 wireless controller and not just use the bluetooth. So he can use these with his phone and not just with the game.
customer_reviews.author: The Coach

customer_reviews.title: Spanish Packaging & Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for someone. Why did we receive Spanish packaging? Not only is the box in a language we don’t speak - but so are the instructions. I don’t want the gift recipient to have to struggle on figuring out how to use this headset, and why do I have to present a gift in packaging that is not in our native language? If the Amazon description had advised it was Spanish packaging, fine - let me make the decision, rather than tarnishing the gift giving experience.
customer_reviews.author: tracie

customer_reviews.title: Good headset, ok sound output.
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this and it never came. Called customer service and Heidi was amazing she helped me with a gift card refund so i bought it again. I FINALLY got it!!! Ita comfortable, sleek but people have problems hearing me sometimes. I have it turned all of the way up etc. I have only used it with my white ps4 just to note.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy W

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones for my gaming
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my PS4. I like the feature of separate volume adjustments for game and chat. The top part that rests on your head is not as comfortable since there is just a band there. I was skeptical of buying at first since it folds and my previous foldable headphones by Sony snapped after a month of use. However these have lasted be a good while so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great PS4 Gaming
customer_reviews.text: Having had these for a few months I can give a pretty accurate review. Great for ps4 gaming. Great sound. TONS of on ear buttons for changing sound types, volume, chat volume and more. Superb sound pick up as well. My voice is always crystal. Even if I have to whisper at night so the kids don’t wake up! Battery life is great, even with kids messing to it I only have to charge every few days. They can definitely take a beating. Everyone knows it’s lag’s fault, but these things kept on ticking. That steel frame bends so it sort of absorbs the blow and is easy to bend back. 10/10 would buy again for ps4 gaming
customer_reviews.author: Reglar Gai

customer_reviews.title: Go to settings first. Nice sound quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: First things first, after putting the dongle in and then turning in the headset on go to settings>devices>audio output headphones. I spent a lot longer than I’d like to admit wondering why I wasn’t getting sound through them. I don’t play online games so I can’t review the mic but overall the surround sound quality is very good. There is also a headphone companion app on the PSstore that will let you customize the eq. Doom Eternal sounds brutal and that’s the way I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Platinum is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be cheap and buy the gold headset get the platinum one. I can talk normally and everybody hears me, I can hear everybody talking and I can hear all the sounds of the game both clearly. Wireless makes a huge difference and if your charging cable is long enough, you can charge while in use. Also, the platinum version folds just like beats headphones. The only issue is the PS5 will have it’s own version of headphones so if you can wait they will probably be slightly better.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: I think these are really good for what I paid
customer_reviews.text: I only have had these for a couple of weeks but I have to say I am happy with my purchase. They are comfortable. easy to use, and they don't seem fragile at all. My only issue is the sound quality takes a bit to tweak and find the right spot. Which you can do on an app that you download on to your Playstation. But unfortunately you can't use the app and a game at the same time so you have to close out the game and then restart it when you want to hear how your new settings sound.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Connection to dongle is absolutely awful.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok headset, all the controls are on the left earphone and it’s really easy to mix up the chat/game adjustment with the volume adjustment. I that’s the least of the problems though, I’m 7 feet max from my PS4 and the dongle still can’t pick up the headset all the time, it’ll just cut out randomly. It’s so bad I bought a usb extender to try and get the dongle somewhere really high, but I’m not even sure that will help. Update: Using an extender to put the dongle above my TV, and overlooking the room, helped the connection issues some. Added a star because it's light and good for smaller heads.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It ain't no pair of Astros... but the companion app makes them come close.
customer_reviews.text: It's a quality headset that fits with the playstation VR. Easy to put on backwards though. Did that a couple times... The fully customizable companion app (free download on PSN) makes them hang with the pro gaming sets, and you get a lot of features for the price point. They hold up better than past models but get dirty really fast. Get 'em if you want an above average gaming headset without spending too much money.
customer_reviews.author: Chef D

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable and leaves marks on your ears. Somewhat heavy especially after a few hours. Constantly have to adjust chat and sound audio from one to the other depending on which happens to be most important at the time. No noise cancelation what so ever. At highest volume I can hear everything going o around me and everyone in my party can hear the faintest dog breathing feom the other room. Battery life 5-6 hrs. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Crash

customer_reviews.title: Selling used for new???
customer_reviews.text: Product is not new as described. Several scratches and scuffs on headset and cords just crammed in the box. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: JSpeed

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for about a month now and it works great. The only bad thing is the durability. These headphones feel like if I sneeze too hard while wearing them, they'd break. Definitely saving money for a better pair of headphones as I anticipate these breaking well before 2019 is out.
customer_reviews.author: Detrich

customer_reviews.title: Super uncomfortable. Like a vice grip around the head
customer_reviews.text: I tried 2-3 different (cheaper )headsets before deciding I’ll pay the money and get the Sony (I have been using last headset for 6 years) This looks pretty cool. Sounds very nice and people can hear me well. But it is so tight, and ear muffs are so uncomfortable, after about 30 min. pressure starts getting to you. I don’t have a big head (although my wife may disagree) never head this problem with any other headset. I will send it back and repurchase another headset.
customer_reviews.author: Turk Akbay

customer_reviews.title: Worked decent...for one day. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: These weren’t comfortable for more than 45min. They hurt my ears. Sound and mic was good...when it worked. Day 1 it worked. Day 2 it started cutting out and my teammates were complaining they couldn’t hear but every third word or so. Day 3 even worse than day 2 and had to use my, much cheaper but, working turtle beach wired set. This inspired a return and I will try Razer 7.1 tournament edition. One good thing was it came with some preset games for optimal audio. Some reason they hadn’t done call of duty, none of them. I felt it had limited sound adjustments. They couldn’t handle bass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ungodly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the least comfortable headphones I have ever had the misfortune of purchasing, which is a shame because everything sounds great. You cannot adjust the microphone, the size of the head band, the ear position or anything. After an hour it felt like my ears were going to explain. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ed B

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL HEADSET!
customer_reviews.text: This headset is definitely NOT worth the money at all. Save yourself from the stress and get something better even if it's wired. The sound on this thing was absolutely terrible. Despite even downloading the headset software from the PSN store it still didn't made a difference. Also, the charging of this headset stopped working after only a few days as well. Overall, it's a terrible product and I would never recommend anyone to buy it. 1/5.
customer_reviews.author: default

customer_reviews.title: An honest opinion on buying 4+pairs
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty good, not great. They need a redesign. Very comfortable, fits well over glasses. Foam ear pads waste away with 4-6 months depending on use and ph of sweat. Plastic used in frames and hinges need to be better, current plastic is not strong enough. The dongle system used is annoying, especially if you LOOSE the dongle as there is NO replacement possible (as far as i can tell). Mic works amazingly, although i wish it was a more directional mic so it didn't pick up every damn sound in the room. There's better units available but I'm too lazy to try new and vastly more expensive units. I've grown used to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good headset, but get a warranty, they will break.
customer_reviews.text: Good headset, but definitely get the warranty. Ive had 2 pairs of these and the hinges have broken on both of them within a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: i have the older version of these headphones as well ...
customer_reviews.text: i have the older version of these headphones as well and i much prefer those. the news ones are flimsy and feel very cheaply made. i would probably look at a different brand unless they make some drastic changes to how they are made. side note as well mine were beat to death in shipping the box came crushed, torn, and broken. luckily the head phones survived. overall not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Short leash
customer_reviews.text: It's ok I guess but the only thing that gets me is you can't walk 2 ft away from your system without it disconnecting I can't tell you how many times I was in chat and got up to go to the bathroom which is in my room and I started to get static. Everything else is fine its comfortable for me and the sound isn't that bad wish it had just a little more bass but that's ok I like to get crazy when it comes to that.
customer_reviews.author: Lord_Theoden

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Now, my head starts to hurt after a while, but that is with anything that goes on my head even a hat so it probably will not bother most people. The sound is great but if you don't pay attention it will get a little weird with connecting to the playstation. Mine is not set to all audio like it should be, so that is just me not listening to direction. I wish it came in a solid black coloring
customer_reviews.author: Lilith Krynesh

customer_reviews.title: Go with the original official ps4 headset
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if the pair of headphones that I got were just terrible but I would just avoid this version. These have a terrible mic, terrible sound quality. You cannot hear hardly anything. The blutooth works but you cannot hear your friends even in party chat. Even at full volume it's like everything is just muffled. This is just a terrible mic. Just go with the original. They may be just a bit less well made, but the sound quality is better in the original version and get a 2 year warranty. When the plastic breaks, just get them replaced for free.
customer_reviews.author: Denim Holman

customer_reviews.title: Good gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: First time buying gaming headset. The set connects easy and you can customize it. The sound is decent, not as good as running it through the home theatre obviously but good enough. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MB3

customer_reviews.title: Amazing simulated surround sound.
customer_reviews.text: I have previously owned the PS Gold headset which was great, but didn't hold up well. Got into a game that really requires the spacial awareness. My what a difference, vs just stereo headsets. They are a little pricey, but they work great and are PS integrated with an app to customize the sound. Get them.
customer_reviews.author: mdisher

customer_reviews.title: Already having Audio issues and drops within the first hour.
customer_reviews.text: This product was by far the worst headset we have had. Within the first hour of having it, the connection would randomly drop and crackle, then pick back up making inconsistent audio and music rather irritating. The connection will drop even though I am within a meter of the dongle reciever and actually disconnect, making me have to turn back off and on the headset. I'm no where near the router which apparently can affect the reception of the headset so make sure that you don't have it near your router or motem if wireless to begin with. Immediately returning this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Lord

customer_reviews.title: Terrible microphone constantly giving bad feedback during gameplay sessions.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! Purchased the Playstation Gold headset two months ago, the device arrived with instructions in another language :( . After about a month of use when using the device to play COD or multiplayer teammates would constantly complain about mic feedback ruining the game and causing them to mute me. Attempted to resolve the issue using the mic settings on the Playstation but nothing worked, I would have to power the device off and on to make the feedback only stop temporarily for a few minutes at a time. Not pleased that I'm unable to return the device for a refund, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look cool... and that's it. (lol)
customer_reviews.text: I honestly bought these in anger since I broke my turtle beach headset. I ended up watching videos and reading reviews a few hours later, and was disappointed. You can tell right away the entire thing is CHEAP! This is the kind of head set you had when Halo first came out! And those were even better 🤣 I would rather spend $20 on a logitech headset.... also I'm getting the vibe amazon is starting to only stock POS products and selling them full price. Also, a lot of reviews are showing that people are receiving "refurbished" items instead of Brand New!!
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: The box and directions are all in Spanish which made it very difficult to set up. We had to Goggle how to use, set up, and sync with our PS4 but still are unable to get it to work properly. The headset is attached to our VR so we can use it somewhat, however we can't control the volume. The headset is supposedly brand new but the packaging looks like it was used. I have a very disappointed 13 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Regretful purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth sucks! Cuts out constantly. Wired works great tho... not comfortable after 30+ minutes, i do wear glasses. Definitely not worth the cost for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: This headset was amazing but I didn’t use it often due to the battery not lasting very long. Now after barely using it since I bought it, it has stopped charging. I’ve always kept it safe in the drawer under my PS4. It seems to be a broken connection somewhere inside the headset because it’s not lighting up when I plug it in. I’m using the supplied cable and all. F
customer_reviews.author: Shayyan

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Fragile - Do NOT drop
customer_reviews.text: Have owned for exactly 4 months. Excellent sound quality and buttons on back of left side ear make for easy adjustments in game. All that went away when they literally fell out of my lap and didn't survive the 1.5 ft. drop from chair to floor.. Left ear is completely dead - which is odd considering the left side buttons and charging ports still work fine. Should probably be a bit more durable given the price. Other downsides - Expect headaches while breaking in the rubber band if you have an adult-sized head.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable and provide a nice surround sound effect. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, poor build quality.
customer_reviews.text: Had them for slightly over a year, use them daily from gaming to watching movies. Sound quality is top notch, can customize it to your liking and can even download custom sound profiles for certain games. However, even after handling with care, they just broke in half. Too bad because this set is quite versatile and comfortable to wear, but I feel that for the price they cost it should have been built with stronger materials. Advice = just handle them with extreme care.
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: great wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually surprised on how great the sound quality is on the headset. Battery life for now is good for now. I don't know exactly how long it is but definitely has plenty of juice even after a long gaming session. Only problem for me is it can get uncomfortable after an hr or so of gaming. Ventilation around the ears might help.
customer_reviews.author: Vetyaz

customer_reviews.title: Not impress with sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Just plug in your favorite wired headset into your controller. I am using my Bose QC35 just fine and offered better surround sound. Returned them within days of trying them,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This headset has fairly good sound, and is small and light. The mic for gaming is muffled and meh... The headset after roughly 15 minutes absolutely kills my ears and I have to constantly readjust them to stop the pain. They fit over my ear, but not my ear lobes. All in all a good headset for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Very good set for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are solid headphones. They are comfortable enough to wear while completing raids on Destiny 2 which can take hours and I don't have to worry about battery life. The sound is good but I tend to keep the game volume down so I can hear my friends. If you like to blast your eardrums to oblivion look at other headsets because these aren't great at loud volumes. You will get some distortion and popping. At normal volumes, these suit their purpose just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working right
customer_reviews.text: They were good and now they are cutting in and out. Purchased in May and here it is end of June and they aren't working right. I just seen the return date was June 16th so I hope the seller contacts me back and will swap them out. My son is 11 and purchased them himself with his own money so now he is very upset cause they aren't working right.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good overall choice
customer_reviews.text: Good for gaming. Solid bass. Quite average if you’re looking for competitive FPS gaming experience to hear enemy footsteps. It works but could do better..
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav

customer_reviews.title: Packaging inconsistent with picture; unsure if new or not.
customer_reviews.text: The headset came in packaging that wasn't sealed (no tape or anything on the front tab: see pictures) and the entire box along with the manual and quick start guide are entirely in Spanish; I don't speak Spanish. The picture of the headset I purchased was in English. I'm not even sure if this headset is "new" or "refurbished." I enjoy unboxing new electronics and keep the packaging; no reason for me to if I can't read the instructions or details on/in the box. Very unhappy as this is a $100 dollar purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Ryan

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT DOES NOT WORK- ALL SPANISH
customer_reviews.text: Would give product 0 stars if I could. Box and instructions were all in Spanish so I Couldnt even setup the headset at first. Also THIS PRODUCT DOES NOT WORK Bluetooth and barely works plugged into your remote. Other players can barely hear you when talking. I tried adjusting every sound setting and pc setting possible and I am still unable to hear anything or talk to others through my headset. Would have returned item if I remembered to keep the box. 10/1 would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: No regret !!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for gaming. They last a long time before recharging 8hrs -12 hrs . So happy 😀 I purchased them , Sound and build quality is awesome and I can walk to my living room from my bedroom (about 13 feet)) before the y lost the signal .
customer_reviews.author: cordell

customer_reviews.title: spotty Bluetooth signal
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to have these sad that the Bluetooth unsyncs so many time when I play there is no interference in the room yet the Bluetooth seems to drop in and out which can be annoying at need to hear moments.
customer_reviews.author: Adelino Esquivel

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few of the cheaper gaming head phones. Some were ok, but most of the either broke or weren't very clear with my audio or my friends complained that they couldn't hear me. These Sony headphones have lasted much longer and the quality is unbeatable. My personal pair have already lasted several years and are still going strong. If you've got the $100 to drop on a pair of gaming headphones this is them.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Check speakers as soon as you get it in the mail four defects
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's one of the speaker cups better popped or blown but I've only used them twice since I got them in the mail and there's a lot of distortion and sometimes the Bluetooth capability doesn't want to connect
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Completely broke within a few months of use. The other players could almost never hear me no matter what settings I chose. By the end, they couldn’t hear me at all and I could hear them glitching in and out. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mulysa ✨

customer_reviews.title: Not wireless for PSVR
customer_reviews.text: 1# it looks like a cheap type of plastic and what look like fake leather 2# I bought this for PSVR so I wouldn’t have to use the wired earbuds but you have to plug it into the PSVR headset with a cable so it’s automatically redundant thanks Sony for making a WIRELESS HEADSET FOR VR AND THEN MAKING YOU HAVE TO PLUG IT IN..... Now if I’m just using it for regular gaming then it’s meh it’s not good or bad it looks really cheap though
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Work as they should.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite headphones for watching tv when the kids are going to sleep and to game with I just hate the usb you have to plug in. I’ve bought 3 pairs of these because I lost the usb to the other two and I haven’t found that you can buy a replacement one.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Conveniently stopped working after 30 days!
customer_reviews.text: Only had this wireless headset for a little over a month. Only used it a handful of times when playing the Last of Us 2 and conveniently they stopped working after 30 days! I can't return through Amazon. Will try to contact Playstation for a replacement pair.
customer_reviews.author: JPS

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions to allow a proper set up since it is kind of confusing at first
customer_reviews.text: Love the product still working the kinks . Having difficulty pairing the audio for people to hear me without having to plug the cable from the headset to the controller I just have to do the set up but all in all I love it
customer_reviews.author: Richard Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This cool I use it for warzone it gets plenty loud.. although lacking the bass I'm used to. Mic works well no complaints from my friends battery life could be better and I wish it had a bluetooth feature so I could hook it up to my phone as well.. bit other then that its solid so far.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Adjustment
customer_reviews.text: They are absolute trash. It’s ether the game is WAY to load and can’t here your team mates (I mostly play modern warfare) or vice versa. Every once in a while when you can actually adjust them right they are amazing but if you set them perfect turn them off for the night it’ll be all screwed up the next day when you turn them on and try to play again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ehhh could be alot better especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price of the headset I think it should sound better and be alot more comfortable I have the corsair wireless headset for gaming and you can tell by just holding it your holding quality the ps4 pro headset feels like cheap plastic and not comfortable for long game play but its like the only thing you can use for Sony ps4 which is why I can't stand proprietary stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for use on a PS4
customer_reviews.text: They sound great, easily balanced for game/chat volume. They are a bit heavy, but they're plenty comfy. The microphone works really well. It's a bit speedy but buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: H. J. Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Great PS4 mic
customer_reviews.text: Works great just like the model previous the only difference is it doesn't have I'll pull out mic its built into the frame. The volume buttons are now push instead of slide. As far as an upgrade it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Frank N

customer_reviews.title: Would have been great
customer_reviews.text: Would have been a great headset but I consistently have to shut them off and turn them back on while in a chat party as they make annoying sounds. I’ve had friends say it sounds like it’s going through a washing machine. I’ve looked up how to fix the issue with no fix. My cousin has turtle beach 700 that I’ll be buying to replace these.
customer_reviews.author: Leah's mommy

customer_reviews.title: OMG Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love the wireless headphones great for laying back and gaming and having the Headset Companion App on your PS4 lets you pre-set your headset for some specific games. Worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Nate P.C.

customer_reviews.title: An upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knowing I was eventually going to pick up a PSVR. Well, prior to Black Friday, these were my go to headset. I have the Uncharted Gold Wireless, and the 500 mil set are much more comfortable and easier to adjust. After having bought the PSVR, these fit perfectly with it!
customer_reviews.author: Pack of Wulffs

customer_reviews.title: Mic 7/10 isn't the best but it works and people can hear me
customer_reviews.text: Sound 10/10. Quality 10/10. Mic 7/10 isn't the best but it works and people can hear me.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Smith

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage I will never buy another pair of these headphones again nor will I recommend them to anyone else they were absolute garbage and continually disconnecting from the console
customer_reviews.author: LaronVonBaron

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are the most expensive headphones I have ever bought and I am glad I did. They are great. I use them so much I forget I have them on sometimes. I only have one complaint and that is partly my fault as I did not realize difference between Bluetooth and wireless. I was expecting Bluetooth so I could use them with my smart tv and my phone. but alas they are wireless but still great. I love the ability to customize sound with the PlayStation.

customer_reviews.title: Muffled audio

customer_reviews.title: Sweet

customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m satisfied with the headphones, as they’re extremely comfortable and sound fantastic, but the mic quality is absolutely awful. It does get better when plugged directly into the controller, but when wireless, I find myself having to repeat things to my friends because everything I say sounds so garbled. It almost sounds like I’m speaking underwater. I definitely expected more out of a company that specializes in making headphones, and that charges such a steep price for them.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works on Nintendo Switch

Price is good for what it offers and go with it for a simple USB adapter Bluetooth headset.

product_meta.title: Sony PlayStation Gold Wireless Headset 7.1 Surround Sound PS4 New Version 2018
product_meta.description:
Color:Gold HeadsetThe new Gold Wireless headset was designed to deliver enhanced comfort and performance while maintaining the amazing gaming audio experience you’ve come to love.

Refined over-ear cushions and sleek design keep you comfortable for long play sessions. High-fidelity 7.1 virtual surround sound breathes new life into the urban jungles and alien worlds you explore. Augmented noise-canceling hidden microphones provide crystal clear communication with friends and teammates.

Experience games as the developer intended through the Headset Companion App, with audio modes tuned by developers exclusively for PlayStation 4 systems. Designed to fit seamlessly with PlayStation VR, experience the stunning worlds of VR in comfort and audio immersion like never before. 

A Headset for Gamers
Experience everything from the big booms to whisper-quiet warnings in stunning 7.1 virtual surround sound and chat with friends through the hidden, noise-canceling microphones.

Developed by PlayStation
With the Headset Companion App, download custom audio modes created exclusively for PlayStation4 systems by developers that are specifically tuned to enhance the audio in your favorite games.

Stylish Comfort/Adaptable Audio
Slip into comfort you can enjoy for hours and a look you can take anywhere. Connect wirelessly to your PS4 systems and home computer using the provided wireless adapter, or connect to your PlayStation VR and mobile devices with the included 3.5mm audio cable and take your sound with you.

Designed with PlayStation VR in mind
Explore the incredible worlds of VR with a headset to be worn comfortably along with PlayStation VR.

Inside the Box
PlayStation Gold Wireless Headset
Wireless Adaptor
3.5mm Audio Cable
USB Cable (Type-A to micro-B)
